name: John Jayvee Camila
title: BSIT Student / Web Developer
bio: I am a passionate web and mobile developer with a strong foundation in modern technologies and a keen eye for creating intuitive user experiences. With expertise spanning frontend frameworks like React and Vue to mobile development with React Native and Flutter, I bring ideas to life through clean, efficient code.

My journey in software development began during my computer science studies, where I discovered my love for building applications that solve real-world problems. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy tackling complex challenges that push the boundaries of what's possible.
goals: Grow and build a strong career in IT through continuous learning and hands-on experience.
Improve my skills in software development and contribute to real-world impactful projects.
Collaborate with talented teams to create innovative solutions that make a difference.
